newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Feb domestic vehicle output down 1.1% yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Japan Feb domestic vehicle output down 1.1% yr/yr.

text.p: Japan's domestic vehicle production in February fell 1.1 percent from a year earlier to 933,539 vehicles, the Japan Automobile Manufacturers' Association (JAMA) said on Monday.
It was the first fall in the February output for six months on a year-on-year basis.
February vehicle exports were estimated to have risen about five percent from a year earlier. The association plans to announce official export figures on March 27.
